erjang
Annotation Type ErlFun

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface ErlFun

Optional Element Summary
 int arity
          Arity of function Value of -1 means "infer from arguments"
 boolean export
           
 java.lang.String module
          Name of enclosing module Value of "__SELFNAME__" means "infer from context"
 java.lang.String name
          Name of function Value of "__SELFNAME__" means "infer from context"
 

module

public abstract java.lang.String module
Name of enclosing module Value of "__SELFNAME__" means "infer from context"

Default:
"__SELFNAME__"

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Name of function Value of "__SELFNAME__" means "infer from context"

Default:
"__SELFNAME__"

arity

Arity of function Value of -1 means "infer from arguments"

Default:

public abstract boolean export
Default:
false
